transforms.code:
#Purpose run through each date and extract total energy by shift
	daycount = system.date.daysBetween(value.MidnightBeforeStartDate,value.RoundUpEndDate)-1
	EnergyList = []

	#Change these depending on the shift of interest
	headers = ["Date", "Shift", "Energy", "Correction Energy", "Avg Power", "Hrs" , "Day Energy"]

	for i in range(daycount):
		
		idate = system.date.addDays(value.MidnightBeforeStartDate, 1+i)
		idaterow = 288*(1+i)
		tommdaterow = 288*(2+i)
		dayenergy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(tommdaterow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow,1)
		currday = system.date.getDayOfWeek(idate)
		
		if currday == 7:
			tomorrow = 1
		else:
			tomorrow = currday + 1
		
		for j in range(5):
			
			starthrminrow = int(value.ShiftRowData.getValueAt(j,0))
			endhrminrow = int(value.ShiftRowData.getValueAt(j,1))
			hrs = value.ShiftRowData.getValueAt(j,2)
			

			if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5): #Check if this is an "overnight shift"
				#Calculate the EOD energy for the overnight shift for tomorrow
				if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5+tomorrow): #EOD energy will be zero, unless tomorrow is an "on" day
					EODEnergy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(tommdaterow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(tommdaterow+starthrminrow,1)
				else: 
					EODEnergy = 0
				#Calclulate the full shift energy (starting yesterday and ending today) as well as the BOD energy 
				if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5+currday): #Energy for this shift and BOD energy is only relevant if it is an "on" day
					energy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+endhrminrow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+starthrminrow,1)
					BODEnergy=value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+endhrminrow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow,1)
				else:
					energy=0
					BODEnergy=0
				correctionenergy = BODEnergy + EODEnergy
			else:
				if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5+currday):
					energy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+endhrminrow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+starthrminrow,1)
					correctionenergy = energy
				else:
					energy = 0
					correctionenergy = 0
					
			if hrs ==0:
				AvgPower = 0
			else:
				AvgPower = energy/hrs
			EnergyList.append([idate, j+1, float(energy), float(correctionenergy), float(AvgPower), float(hrs), float(dayenergy)])
	dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, EnergyList)

 	return dataset

ShiftList = []
	headers = ["ShiftStartRow","ShiftEndRow","Hours"]
	
	for j in range(5):
		
		endhrminrow=round(value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,3)*12+value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,4)/5)
		
		if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5):
			starthrminrow=round(value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,1)*12+value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,2)/5-288)
			hrs =(endhrminrow/12+(-starthrminrow)/12)
		else:
			starthrminrow=round(value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,1)*12+value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,2)/5)
			hrs = (endhrminrow-starthrminrow)/12
		ShiftList.append([starthrminrow, endhrminrow, hrs])
	
	dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, ShiftList)

 	return dataset

newList = []
	headers = ["t_stamp", "Shift 1", "Shift 2", "Shift 3", "Shift 4", "Shift 5", "DayEnergy", "Downtime"]
	row = 0
	if self.custom.EnergyOrAvgPower == 1:
		
		while row < value.getRowCount():
			date = value.getValueAt(row,0)
			energy1 = max(value.getValueAt(row,2),0)
			energy2 = max(value.getValueAt(row+1,2),0)
			energy3 = max(value.getValueAt(row+2,2),0)
			energy4 = max(value.getValueAt(row+3,2),0)
			energy5 = max(value.getValueAt(row+4,2),0)
			dayenergy = max(value.getValueAt(row,6),0)
			downtime = max(value.getValueAt(row,6)-value.getValueAt(row,3)-value.getValueAt(row+1,3)-value.getValueAt(row+2,3)-value.getValueAt(row+3,3)-value.getValueAt(row+4,3),0)
			newList.append([date, energy1, energy2, energy3, energy4, energy5, dayenergy, downtime])	
			row=row+5
	else:
		while row < value.getRowCount():
			date = value.getValueAt(row,0)
			power1 = max(value.getValueAt(row,4),0)
			power2 = max(value.getValueAt(row+1,4),0)
			power3 = max(value.getValueAt(row+2,4),0)
			power4 = max(value.getValueAt(row+3,4),0)
			power5 = max(value.getValueAt(row+4,4),0)
			dayenergy = max(value.getValueAt(row,6),0)
			downtimeenergy = max(value.getValueAt(row,6)-value.getValueAt(row,3)-value.getValueAt(row+1,3)-value.getValueAt(row+2,3)-value.getValueAt(row+3,3)-value.getValueAt(row+4,3),0)
			downtimehours = max(24-value.getValueAt(row,5)-value.getValueAt(row+1,5)-value.getValueAt(row+2,5)-value.getValueAt(row+3,5)-value.getValueAt(row+4,5),0)
			if downtimehours == 0:
				downtimeenergy = 0
			else:
				downtimepower = downtimeenergy/downtimehours
			newList.append([date, power1, power2, power3, power4, power5, dayenergy, downtimeenergy])	
			row=row+5
	
	dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, newList)
	
	return dataset

tooltip.text: Total cost for the energy consumed in the period of time shown in the graph.  Change the energy cost multiplier in the company settings page.

config.expression: if({..../EnergyTopBar/ByDayorMonth.props.value}=1,"The cost of the peak power for the time period shown, per month. Note that the peak bill is only charge monthly. To see monthly peak charges expected, use the monthly view","The total cost from all of the months shown.  To change the peak cost multiplier (called a demand charge), see the company settings.")
if({..../EnergyTopBar/ByDayorMonth.props.value}=1, "Peak Power (within this range)", "Avg Peak per mo.")

tooltip.text: Total energy consumed in the time period shown in the graph.

config.expression: if({..../EnergyTopBar/ByDayorMonth.props.value}=1,"The peak power for the time period shown","The average peak for the months shown")

#Purpose run through each date and extract total energy by shift
	daycount = system.date.daysBetween(value.MidnightBeforeStartDate,value.RoundUpEndDate)-1
	EnergyList = []

	#Change these depending on the shift of interest
	headers = ["Date", "Shift", "Energy", "Correction Energy", "Avg Power", "Hrs" , "Day Energy"]

	for i in range(daycount):
		
		idate = system.date.addDays(value.MidnightBeforeStartDate, 1+i)
		idaterow = 288*(1+i)
		tommdaterow = 288*(2+i)
		dayenergy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(tommdaterow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow,1)
		currday = system.date.getDayOfWeek(idate)
		
		if currday == 7:
			tomorrow = 1
		else:
			tomorrow = currday + 1
		
		for j in range(5):
			
			starthrminrow = int(value.ShiftRowData.getValueAt(j,0))
			endhrminrow = int(value.ShiftRowData.getValueAt(j,1))
			hrs = value.ShiftRowData.getValueAt(j,2)
			

			if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5): #Check if this is an "overnight shift"
				#Calculate the EOD energy for the overnight shift for tomorrow
				if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5+tomorrow): #EOD energy will be zero, unless tomorrow is an "on" day
					EODEnergy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(tommdaterow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(tommdaterow+starthrminrow,1)
				else: 
					EODEnergy = 0
				#Calclulate the full shift energy (starting yesterday and ending today) as well as the BOD energy 
				if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5+currday): #Energy for this shift and BOD energy is only relevant if it is an "on" day
					energy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+endhrminrow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+starthrminrow,1)
					BODEnergy=value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+endhrminrow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow,1)
				else:
					energy=0
					BODEnergy=0
				correctionenergy = BODEnergy + EODEnergy
			else:
				if value.ShiftData.getValueAt(j,5+currday):
					energy = value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+endhrminrow,1)-value.EnergyData.getValueAt(idaterow+starthrminrow,1)
					correctionenergy = energy
				else:
					energy = 0
					correctionenergy = 0
					
			if hrs ==0:
				AvgPower = 0
			else:
				AvgPower = energy/hrs
			EnergyList.append([idate, j+1, float(energy), float(correctionenergy), float(AvgPower), float(hrs), float(dayenergy)])
	dataset = system.dataset.toDataSet(headers, EnergyList)

 	return dataset
